@HeatherChloeDog @DrFrancesRyan Surprising. Most people who are disabled or chronically ill are able to just afford rent, council tax, water, energy, phone bills. Small amount for groceries which are getting so expensive. Iâ€™m lucky family takes me to hospital appts transport so expensive.
@JTAdeyemi Council tax. Energy. Gas. Water. Transport. Insurance. Broadband. Phone bills. Student finance & debt repayments (if you have) Unfortunately life isnâ€™t just rent and groceries.
